subject: Cybersecurity
title: Google's Data Empire: What Google Knows About You
description: A short lesson to help you apply Google's Data Empire: What Google Knows About You.

hook.text: Google knows your search history, location history, YouTube watch history, emails, contacts, and calendar ‚Äì all in.

buildup.text: Google's business model is advertising. The more it knows about you, the more precisely it can target ads.

discovery.text: Google Timeline tracks everywhere you go. Even with location history 'off,' Google apps still record location data.

twist.text: An AP investigation found Google tracked location even when users turned off Location History ‚Äì a setting name.

climax.text: You can download your Google data archive. Most people are shocked by the volume when they see it all in one place.

punchline.text: Location History was 'off.' Google tracked you anyway.

quiz.question: What did the AP investigation reveal about Google's location tracking?
options: Google only tracks location when apps are open
Google tracked location even when users disabled the Location History setting
